description.value:
You attack your foe and analyze how it reacts. Make a Strike. On a hit, you can immediately attempt a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge] about the target. On a critical hit, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the check to Recall Knowledge.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Instructive Strike]
